item.title: [COLORdodgerblue]Bones and All[/COLOR] [COLORlime][R] 11/23/2022 Romance, Drama, Horror 2h 11m[COLORwhite] ~ Abandoned by her father, a young woman embarks on a thousand-mile odyssey through the backroads of America where she meets a disenfranchised drifter.
